subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Jockey John Velazquez is ready to return to racing five weeks after a spill at Keeneland in Lexington, Ky., left him with a cracked right shoulder blade and bruised ribs.
snippet: Jockey John Velazquez is ready to return to racing five weeks after a spill at Keeneland in Lexington, Ky., left him with a cracked right shoulder blade and bruised ribs.
